body:
@vrv, Yeah agree, I noticed this implementation I thought it was by design.

std::stoi doesn't look safe since it throws exception when input is wrong, see http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/string/basic_string/stol.

Can we use atol instead, it returns 0 on error, looks like what we want. 

Thoughts?
